Chapter.Title: Python Question 4
Chapter.Data: Write a program to take Merscythe, Loog and Herv to floor minus -3 in the glass elevator. To use the GlassElevator class, the first line of the program must be: from GlassElevator import GlassElevator After you have written the program, run the program. If you write the program correctly, chapter 5 will be unlocked.

Instruction.ExpectedOutput:
Current floor: 0

Total floors: 201

At floor 0, moving down to floor -3

At floor -1, moving down to floor -3

At floor -2, moving down to floor -3

Arrived at floor -3
Instruction.Code:
class Elevator
Method Description
go_to_floor(target_floor) Method to take elevator to the floor number given as argument.
at_top() Method returns True if elevator is at the topmost floor; otherwise, it returns False.
at_bottom() Method returns True if elevator is at the bottom floor; otherwise, it returns False.
